Lamonts Apparel Inc , an operator of 42 family <unk> stores in six northwestern states , said it has filed a reorganization plan in bankruptcy court in Seattle .

DT NN NN VBZ IN DT VBN NNS TO VB VBN IN JJ . 
O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
